attributes.value: Thinks friendship is important
Respects fair-dealing and fair-play
Sees introspection as important
Has a great deal of respect for worthy craftsmanship
Finds the pursuit of skill mastery off-putting
Believes that those who sacrifice for others should be deeply respected
Is offended by leisure time and leisurely living
Often feels envious of others
Has a greedy streak
Revels in chaos and discord, and she encourages it whenever possible
Dislikes receiving advice, preferring to keep her own counsel
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Is sometimes cruel
Tends to consider what others think of her
Doesn't generally think before acting
Lives a fast-paced life
Actively avoids exciting or stressful situations
Is not readily moved by art or natural beauty
Susceptible to disease
Good intuition
A sum of patience
